Introduction
CCU8 Global App

Introduction

This is a library app and does not provide any UI configurations. This app only provides APIs. It should not be used standalone as it does not consume any HW resources which are neede for generating PWM waveforms. This library is used by PWMSP002 and PWMMP001 app.

Scope

This library app provides APIs for PWMSP002 and PWMMP001 app to generate PWM waveforms.

CCU8PWMLIB_abbreviation

  1. API: Application Program Interface
  2. App: Application
  3. CC: Capture/Compare Slice
  4. CCU: Capture/Compare Unit
  5. GUI: Graphical User Interface

CCU8PWMLIB_reference

None

CCU8PWMLIB_limitation

None
